meanings.sent1: She kept oversweetening the tea until it was undrinkable.
meanings.sent2: Stop oversweetening the lemonade; it's already sugary enough.
meanings.sent3: The baker accidentally oversweetened the cake, turning it into a dessert disaster.
meanings.sent4: His compliments were like oversweetening words, making her doubt their sincerity.
meanings.sent5: The oversweetening of the song with too many instruments ruined its beauty.

meanings.definition: The act of adding too much sugar or sweetener to something.
meanings.sent1: The oversweetening of the dessert made it too sugary for her taste.
meanings.sent2: His oversweetening of the coffee was a result of his sweet tooth.
meanings.sent3: The oversweetening of the punch turned the party into a sugar rush fest.
meanings.sent4: The oversweetening of the sauce masked the natural flavors of the dish.
meanings.sent5: The oversweetening of the cookies made them irresistible to the kids.
